scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:es2015
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:flow
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:check: npm run our:release:check:changelog && npm run our:release:check:dirty
scripts.our:release:check:changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags

2.2.0.name: editions
2.2.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: esnext source code with require for modules
esnext compiled for node.js 0.8 with require for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:edition-node-0.8
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationDir ./compiled-types/ --declarationMap
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project

3.2.0.name: editions
3.2.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) )
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

3.7.0.name: editions
3.7.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) )
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

3.10.0.name: editions
3.10.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules

scripts.our:compile: yarn run our:compile:deno && yarn run our:compile:edition-es5 && yarn run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) )
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: yarn run our:meta:contributors && yarn run our:meta:docs && yarn run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: yarn run our:release:prepare && yarn run our:release:check-changelog && yarn run our:release:check-dirty && yarn run our:release:tag && yarn run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: yarn run our:clean && yarn run our:compile && yarn run our:test && yarn run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: yarn run our:verify:directory && yarn run our:verify:eslint && yarn run our:verify:prettier

3.13.0-next.1595344178.af1edf11622585e7b.name: editions
3.13.0-next.1595344178.af1edf11622585e7b.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-node-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-node-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-node-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-node-esm/source || ( mv edition-node-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-node-esm && mv edition-temp edition-node-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-node-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

3.15.0.name: editions
3.15.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-node-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-node-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-node-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-node-esm/source || ( mv edition-node-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-node-esm && mv edition-temp edition-node-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-node-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

4.0.0.name: editions
4.0.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-node-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-node-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-node-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-node-esm/source || ( mv edition-node-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-node-esm && mv edition-temp edition-node-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-node-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

4.2.0-next.1599396055.134f4c9d16824ea53a.name: editions
4.2.0-next.1599396055.134f4c9d16824ea53a.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

4.2.0-next.1600606133.48fc891d64cd4e91fd.name: editions
4.2.0-next.1600606133.48fc891d64cd4e91fd.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

4.2.0-next.1602412915.2c13c2b68f0dd28dd4.name: editions
4.2.0-next.1602412915.2c13c2b68f0dd28dd4.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

6.0.0.name: editions
6.0.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules
TypeScript source code made to be compatible with Deno

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

6.2.0.name: editions
6.2.0.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin master && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

6.4.0-next.1627437542.0533fda972613bf5ce.name: editions
6.4.0-next.1627437542.0533fda972613bf5ce.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier

6.5.0-next.1627492815.70d636cf1825e8ec06.name: editions
6.5.0-next.1627492815.70d636cf1825e8ec06.description: Publish multiple editions for your JavaScript packages consistently and easily (e.g. source edition, esnext edition, es2015 edition)

editions.description: TypeScript source code with Import for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Require for modules
TypeScript compiled against ES5 for Node.js with Import for modules

scripts.our:compile: npm run our:compile:deno && npm run our:compile:edition-es5 && npm run our:compile:edition-es5-esm && npm run our:compile:types
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5: tsc --module commonjs --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5 --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5/source || ( mv edition-es5/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5 && mv edition-temp edition-es5 ) ) && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > edition-es5/package.json
scripts.our:compile:edition-es5-esm: tsc --module ESNext --target ES5 --outDir ./edition-es5-esm --project tsconfig.json && ( test ! -d edition-es5-esm/source || ( mv edition-es5-esm/source edition-temp && rm -Rf edition-es5-esm && mv edition-temp edition-es5-esm ) ) && echo '{"type": "module"}' > edition-es5-esm/package.json
scripts.our:compile:types: tsc --project tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --declarationMap --declarationDir ./compiled-types && ( test ! -d compiled-types/source || ( mv compiled-types/source edition-temp && rm -Rf compiled-types && mv edition-temp compiled-types ) )
scripts.our:deploy: echo no need for this project
scripts.our:meta: npm run our:meta:contributors && npm run our:meta:docs && npm run our:meta:projectz
scripts.our:release: npm run our:release:prepare && npm run our:release:check-changelog && npm run our:release:check-dirty && npm run our:release:tag && npm run our:release:push
scripts.our:release:check-changelog: cat ./HISTORY.md | grep v$npm_package_version || (echo add a changelog entry for v$npm_package_version && exit -1)
scripts.our:release:prepare: npm run our:clean && npm run our:compile && npm run our:test && npm run our:meta
scripts.our:release:push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.our:release:tag: export MESSAGE=$(cat ./HISTORY.md | sed -n "/## v$npm_package_version/,/##/p" | sed 's/## //' | awk 'NR>1{print buf}{buf = $0}') && test "$MESSAGE" || (echo 'proper changelog entry not found' && exit -1) && git tag v$npm_package_version -am "$MESSAGE"
scripts.our:verify: npm run our:verify:directory && npm run our:verify:eslint && npm run our:verify:prettier
